content.en: Improved image segmentation: Researchers have developed various algorithms based on the pulse coupled neural network (PCNN) to improve image segmentation in infrared images. These algorithms abandon traditional mechanisms and use techniques like histogram analysis and adaptive parameter determination to achieve more accurate segmentation. Additionally, algorithms that combine PCNN with other optimization techniques like particle swarm optimization (PSO) and gravitational search algorithm (GLGSA) have been proposed to automatically determine suitable parameters for image segmentation, resulting in better segmentation accuracy.
content.da: Forbedret billedsegmentering: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer baseret på det pulskoblede neurale netværk (PCNN) for at forbedre billedsegmentering i infrarøde billeder. Disse algoritmer opgiver traditionelle mekanismer og anvender teknikker som histogramanalyse og adaptiv parameterbestemmelse for at opnå mere præcis segmentering. Desuden er algoritmer, der kombinerer PCNN med andre optimeringsteknikker som partikelsværmoptimering (PSO) og gravitationssøgealgoritme (GLGSA), blevet foreslået til automatisk at bestemme passende parametre for billedsegmentering, hvilket resulterer i bedre segmenteringsnøjagtighed.
